description:
Got a lot of gear? This is the same Grangers 2-in-1 that you love, just in a bigger bottle. This wash-in formula delivers effective cleaning, and restores durable water-repellency, in a single wash and dry cycle.

  • Cleans all technical outdoor fabrics and clothing including GORE-TEX®, eVent®
  • Restores water-repellent finishes
  • Heat activated in 30°C water and a low temperature tumble drier
  • PFAS-free formula
  • 100% recycled container is made from post-consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Wash + Repel Clothing 2-in1 1L
